short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivational quote generator to inspire you throughout the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean, easy-to-use tool which allows you to randomly generate inspirational quotes from your extension toolbar. A simple solution for when you need a quick burst of motivation during a busy or stressful day.
